statements: SELECT * FROM ethics_approval;
SELECT researcher_name, research_title FROM ethics_approval WHERE approval_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM ethics_approval WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT research_title, researcher_name FROM ethics_approval ORDER BY research_title ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, approval_status FROM ethics_approval WHERE approval_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ethics_approval WHERE approval_status='Approved';
SELECT researcher_name, research_title FROM ethics_approval WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, researcher_name, research_description FROM ethics_approval ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT approval_status FROM ethics_approval;
SELECT * FROM ethics_approval WHERE research_title ILIKE '%ethics%';
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT research_description FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM approval_logs WHERE approval_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT project_id, approval_granted_by, comments FROM approval_logs WHERE log_id = 5;
SELECT project_id, project_name, researcher_name, research_description, approval_status FROM research_projects WHERE approval_status = true;
SELECT project_id, project_name, researcher_name, research_description FROM research_projects WHERE researcher_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT project_id, researcher_name, research_description FROM research_projects WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT project_id, approval_date, approval_granted_by, comments FROM approval_logs WHERE approval_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, researcher_name, approval_status FROM research_projects WHERE project_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT * FROM research_projects WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE department = 'Biology';
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM research_projects WHERE project_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE researcher_id = 5;
SELECT committee_name, committee_description FROM oversight_committee WHERE committee_id = 1;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM research_projects;
SELECT researcher_name, department, position FROM researchers ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, department FROM research_projects INNER JOIN researchers ON research_projects.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT project_name, project_description, approval_status FROM research_projects WHERE approval_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM oversight_committee ORDER BY committee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_name, researcher_id FROM research_projects WHERE approval_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT approval_id, project_id FROM approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, researcher_email FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University';
SELECT subject_name, subject_gender FROM subjects WHERE subject_age > 30 AND subject_gender = 'Female';
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, approval_date FROM research_projects JOIN researchers ON research_projects.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id
SELECT * FROM researchers WHERE institution = 'University of Science'
SELECT subject_name, subject_age, subject_gender FROM subjects WHERE subject_age BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT project_name, researcher_name, approval_date FROM research_projects JOIN researchers ON research_projects.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id ORDER BY approval_date DESC

SELECT approval_id, project_name, researcher_name, approval_date FROM approvals JOIN research_projects ON approvals.project_id = research_projects.project_id JOIN researchers ON approvals.researcher_id = researchers.researcher_id
SELECT * FROM research_projects;
SELECT project_title, researcher_name FROM research_projects WHERE approval_status='Approved';
SELECT project_title, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT subject_name, subject_age, subject_gender FROM research_subjects WHERE project_id=1;
SELECT approval_id, project_id, approval_date, committee_member FROM research_approvals;
SELECT project_id, project_title FROM research_projects;
SELECT researcher_name, approval_status, start_date FROM research_projects;
SELECT subject_name, subject_age, subject_gender FROM research_subjects WHERE subject_age > 30;
SELECT approval_date, approval_notes, committee_member FROM research_approvals WHERE approval_notes IS NOT NULL;
SELECT member_name, member_email FROM committee_members ORDER BY member_name DESC;
